tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE images_and_reports (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    report TEXT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    upload_date TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
              date_of_birth DATE,
              gender CHAR(1) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE medical_records (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
                  record_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
                  record_date DATE,
                  notes TEXT,
                  image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
                  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id))

CREATE TABLE Patient_Images (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  image_url TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  privacy_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Diagnostic_Reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  report_text TEXT,
  report_date DATE,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Consultation_Logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  consultation_date TIMESTAMP,
  consultation_duration INT,
  consultation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_consultations (
    consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    consultation_date DATE,
    consultation_time TIME,
    consultation_notes TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE Patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, patient_age INT, patient_gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE HealthCondition (condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, condition_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, condition_description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id))
CREATE TABLE Image (image_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, image_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, image_data BYTEA, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id))
CREATE TABLE DiagnosticReport (report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, report_date DATE NOT NULL, report_details TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id))
CREATE TABLE Consultation (consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, consultation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, consultation_details TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id))
